channel.title: Running Java
channel.description: When I run my program such as my RSPS Client, the command prompt always comes up with it. How do I get rid of the command prompt but keep up my Client? A code or explanation would help, preferably both.

item.title: Running Java
item.dc:creator: @j19283746 j19283746
item.description:
@j19283746 wrote:

No really… Like I havent tried that… I am a senier member dude… Not a first time poster.
-.-
Anyways I figured it out all by myself. Just add start right before java bla blah blah.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mod_Brandon12111 wrote:

Just edit the command prompt and put the word exit at the end lol.
